subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A day after a bullpen implosion doomed the Yankees to a blowout loss in their stadium’s debut, four relievers held the Indians scoreless after a rough start by Joba Chamberlain.
snippet: A day after a bullpen implosion doomed the Yankees to a blowout loss in their stadium’s debut, four relievers held the Indians scoreless after a rough start by Joba Chamberlain.
